_header: Fifteen tokens I tellen may / Of XV days ere doomsday [Fiftene toknen ich tellen may / Of XV dayes er domesday]
Note: Other MSS prefix a short invocation: see 3000.
_description: The Fifteen Signs before the Day of Judgment

BodAddE6.First Lines:
XV tokenes tellin y mayXV dayis be forin domis dayAlso him
                    seyez þe profecieAftir þe wordis of ieromie…
BodAddE6.Last Lines:
…Wanne we habbin nede & nouþe þou vs bringe out
                    of þe deuelis mouþe

BodDig86.First Lines:
Fiftene toknen ich telles mayOf xv dayes er
                    domesdai…
BodDig86.Last Lines:
…Ihesu crist ȝe þat we motenAr we bended of oure
                    sunnen debote
